**Sustainable Materials**: Replace non-renewable materials with sustainable ones, such as recycled plastic or biodegradable materials, to reduce the environmental impact of the laptop.
**Enhanced Display**: Upgrade the display to a high-resolution, high-color-accuracy panel that reduces eye strain and offers better visual comfort for extended periods of use.

**Longer Battery Life**: Increase the battery life to allow users to work or study for extended periods without needing to recharge. This could be achieved through more efficient power management or larger battery capacity.
**Smart Features**: Incorporate AI and machine learning capabilities to enhance the user experience, such as voice recognition, predictive typing, or personalized productivity features.
**Immersive Audio**: Upgrade the audio system to provide a more immersive listening experience, possibly with high-quality speakers or support for high-resolution audio formats.
